mapper.select: SELECT sum(a.price*b.item_count) as price , sum((price-(a.price*(a.discount)))*b.item_Count) as total , sum(a.price*b.item_count*a.discount) as discount FROM basket b join item i on i.item_seq like b.item_seq join customer c on c.custom_id like b.custom_id join common_feature a on a.item_code like i.item_code WHERE i.item_seq = b.item_seq AND b.custom_id = #{customid} AND a.item_code = i.item_code
SELECT i.item_name as itemName , i.color_exp as colorExp , i.item_seq as itemSeq , i.pic_name as picName , i.item_code as itemCode FROM item i join common_feature c on i.item_code like c.item_code
